presenting_symptoms.impact: Inability to get out of bed

presenting_symptoms.context: Lack of motivation for previously routine activities
presenting_symptoms.impact: Expressed 'I just don't see the point in going' (to work)
Inability to return to sleep due to racing, negative thoughts
Believes 'I'm a failure' and 'letting everyone down'
Wishes 'I could disappear sometimes' and thinks family 'would be better off'

mental_status_exam.behavior: Not assessed (No psychomotor retardation/agitation observed in session, though reported 'racing mind')
mental_status_exam.affect: Constricted/Restricted, Congruent with depressed mood (Per user feedback)
mental_status_exam.thought_process: Goal-directed (Observed); Reports internal *racing thoughts* during insomnia (Symptom)
mental_status_exam.insight: Good (Acknowledges distress and willingness to modify treatment)
mental_status_exam.judgment: Impaired function (Missing work), but safety judgment appears intact ('I couldn't do that to them')

past_psychiatric_history.major_episodes: Implied history of being 'on the low side' previously.

social_history.employment: Employed; experiencing significant impairment (missed 3 days of work this week)
